AS THEY WERE GETTING TOTHE SWITCH THAT DIVIDES THE NEW WEST & OLD WEST, SOO ENGINEER & STUDENT ENGINEER SAW THE BNSF APPROACHING ON THE NEW WESTBOUND. WHEN IT APPEARED THAT BNSF WAS NOT GOING TO STOP, BEFORE FOULING SWITCHTHAT WAS NOT LINED FOR THEIR MOVEMENT, SOO CREW BLEW WHISTLE & DUMPED THE AIR, BUT NOT ABLE TO STOPBEFORE ENGINES MADE CONTACT AT THE SWITCH. SOO ENGINE CP 1404 DAMAGED & DERAILED. PROX 44502 DAMAGED. BNSF 8029 DAMAGED & DERAILED. BNSF CREW RESPONSIBLE FOR HUMAN FACTOR - VIOLATION OF GCOR 6.28 - MOVEMENT ON OTHER THAN MAIN TRACK, FAILED TO STOP SHORT OF SWITCH.

THE CREW WAS RUNNING FROM UNIT UP 7178 WHEN THEY SHOVED ABOUT 10 CAR LENGTHS TOWARDS THEM DUMPER AND CAME TO A STOP.  THE TRAIN DIDNOT GO INTO EMERGENCY AND THERE WAS NO APPARENT ISSUE WITH THE ENGINE.   THE CONDUCTOR AND UTILITY MAN WALKED THE TRAIN AND FOUND 13 CARS DERAILED ACCOUNT WIDE GAUGE ON THE UP'S INDUSTRIAL LEAD.  DERAILED CARS:  CWEX 9109, 6585, 1196, 1293, 5486, 7001, 5629, 5175, 5461, 9226, 1829, 1159, 6402 UNIONPACIFIC RAILROAD REPORTED #23,319 IN TRACK DAMAGE.

021409-d-02-14-09-ESSV.Narrative: THE RAILCREW MADE A CUT ON TRACK 14, TAKING 6 CARS, LEAVING 5. THE BRAKEMAN FAILED TO APPLY A SUFFICIENT NUMBER OF HAND BRAKES ON THE CARS HE LEFT ON TRACK 14. THEY THEN SWITCHED TO HEAD TO TRACK 11.THEY BEGAN SHOVING DOWN 11 TRACK. WHEN THEY HEARD A LOAD NOISE THEY STOPPED MOVEMENT AND FOUND THATTHE 5 CARS LEFT ON TRACK 14 HAD ROLLED INTO THE TRAIN THEY WERE WORKING WITH. THE HEAD CAR ON TRACK14, EQUX 620042, WAS A LOADED CAR. IT COLLIDED WITH THE 4 CAR IN THE TRAIN CONSIST, EQUX630169, IT WAS EMPTY. NO CARS DERAILED, AND NOONE WAS INJURED.

R94491-28 WAS PERFORMING SWITCHING AT KOPPERS INDUSTRIES WHEN THE CREW LEFT SIX CARS TIED DOWN ON THE KOPPER'S LEAD.  A TOTAL OF TWO HANDBRAKES WERE LEFT ON THE SIX CARS.  THE CREW CUT THEIR ENGINE AWAY FROM THE TRAIN AND WENT TO THE WORKING LEAD TOWARDS THE 7/8 SWITCH.  WHEN THE CONDUCTOR NOTICED THE CUT OF CARS ROLLING DOWN THE OUTBOUND LEAD, HE TRIED TO GET THE
 ENGINEER TO MOVE THE ENGINE BUTDIDN'T HAVE ENOUGH TIME AND ACFX 87677 SIDESWIPED IC 9634 CAUSING THE ENGINE TO DERAIL.  IT WAS FOUND THAT INSUFFICIENT HANDBRAKES WERE APPLIED ALLOWING CARS TO ROLL OUT.  CONDUCTOR WAS TESTED, RESULTS WERE NEGATIVE.
